newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CST.
LIVE CATTLE - Off 0.100 to up 0.300 cent. Fundamentals mostly bearish but deferreds could follow hogs.
FEEDER CATTLE - Off 0.200 to up 0.100 cent. Higher corn futures call but index up and may follow other pits.
LEAN HOGS - Steady to up 0.500 cent. Deferreds seen up further from Thursday's Hogs and Pigs report but nearbys toppy. Taiwan problem still supportive to market.
PORK BELLIES - Steady to up 0.400 cent. Carryover from Hogs and Pigs Report and cash supportive.
